name: SCRN
description: This command will allow you to lock, unlock, refresh, and reset the screen.

parameters.name: what_to_do
parameters.description: L - lock the screen; all display to the screen will be stopped until the unlock or refresh option is run. U - unlock the screen; DO NOT refresh any screen fields currently displayed. R - refresh any fields currently displayed on the screen. S reset the screen, and eliminate the effect of the current window.

program_editor: User interface -> Screen control -> screen L/u/r/s
